text: Ivan Spychka (; born 18 January 1991) is a Ukrainian football midfielder who currently plays in Armenia for FC Ararat Yerevan. ==Club career== Spychka is a product of the different Dnipropetrovsk youth sportive school systems. Then he transferred to FC Metalurh Zaporizhya youth sportive school and became a member of the main team. He made his debut in the Ukrainian Premier League in the match against FC Volyn Lutsk on 28 November 2010. In August 2013 he signed a contract with FC Dynamo-2 and left this club in June 2015. ==References == ==External links== * * *Prifile at allplayers.in.ua Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:FC Metalurh-2 Zaporizhya players Category:FC Helios Kharkiv players Category:FC Arsenal-Kyivshchyna Bila Tserkva players Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Dnipro Category:FC Dynamo-2 Kyiv players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Ararat Moscow players Category:FC Ararat Yerevan players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Armenia
title: Ivan Spychka
